frontmatter.title: State of Application Modernization Report 2022
frontmatter.description: Both anecdotes and past surveys tell us that organizations are modernizing their applications. We wanted to dig deeper into the specifics. To do so, Konveyor community contributor Red Hat sponsored a survey of 600 IT decision makers (ITDM), backend developers, and software architects in the US, UK, and English-speaking Asia-Pacific (APAC).
